title: Google\Cloud\Vision\V1\TextDetectionParams
name: TextDetectionParams
description:
Parameters for text detections. This is used to control TEXT_DETECTION and DOCUMENT_TEXT_DETECTION features.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.vision.v1.TextDetectionParams

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.enable_text_detection_confidence_score
params.description: By default, Cloud Vision API only includes confidence score for DOCUMENT_TEXT_DETECTION result. Set the flag to true to include confidence score for TEXT_DETECTION as well.

methods.name: getEnableTextDetectionConfidenceScore
methods.description:
By default, Cloud Vision API only includes confidence score for DOCUMENT_TEXT_DETECTION result. Set the flag to true to include confidence score for TEXT_DETECTION as well.

Generated from protobuf field bool enable_text_detection_confidence_score = 9;

methods.name: setEnableTextDetectionConfidenceScore
methods.description:
By default, Cloud Vision API only includes confidence score for DOCUMENT_TEXT_DETECTION result. Set the flag to true to include confidence score for TEXT_DETECTION as well.

Generated from protobuf field bool enable_text_detection_confidence_score = 9;
